CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(Name, 'Manual') , '4200001 - Manual Revenue', IF(CONTAINS(Name, 'Travel Fee') , '4002001 - Travel Revenue', IF(CONTAINS(Name, 'Travel') , '4002001 - Travel Revenue', IF( Product_Line__c <> 'PBL' , '4001001 - Seminar Revenue', IF( AND(Product_Line__c = 'PBL', Product_Type_2__c = 'Presenter Led') , '4100250 - STEM PBL Teacher Training', IF( AND(Product_Line__c = 'PBL', Product_Type_2__c <> 'Presenter Led') , '4100200 - STEM PBL Revenue', '0'))))))
CustomField.label: Xero Account
